When Hitting an Enemy with an Attack, %1 Chance to consume the Burn Stacks you inflicted when their Burn Stacks exceed %2, increasing Damage of the Hit by %3 per consumed stack

Your Attacks generate "Unleashed Fury" Points up to a maximum of %1. Points reset after %2s out of combat

Gain access to two "Stances": "Probing Weakness" and "Stalwart Resolve". A "Stance" is changed when a Dodge Roll is used.
While "Probing Weakness" is active, you have a %1 Chance to double Attack Damage at the cost of %2 of your All Resistances Score
While "Stalwart Resolve" is active, you have %1 Block Chance and %2 Block Efficiency at the cost of %3 of your Attack and Spell Damage
Increases Chance to double Attack Damage while "Probing Weakness" is active by %1
Increases Block Chance while "Stalwart Resolve" is active by %1
%1 of Weapon Damage dealt to Attacking Enemy when their Attack is Blocked
Damage dealt to Attacking Enemy when their Attack is Blocked is dealt as Rend Damage
Provides alternative fourth Attack to each basic weapon Combo
Fourth Attack of a Bow weapon Attack Combo shoots multiple arrows in all directions
Fourth Attack of a Staff weapon Combo fires additional projectiles in Target's direction
Fourth Attack of a Two-Handed weapon Attack Combo Stuns all enemies hit.
Fourth Attack of a One-Handed weapon Attack Combo is a Critical Hit
Fourth Attack of each basic weapon Combo deals %1 additional Damage
While stationary, gain 1 "Inexorable" Point every %1s, up to a maximum of %2
Allows Bonuses to be applied depending on Chest-piece equipped

Gain All Resistance Score equal to All Resistance score on equipped Heavy Chest-piece
You regenerate Health and Force Shield equivalent to %1 times the Health given by your equipped Rogue Chest-piece each time you complete a successful Passive Dodge.

Dealing Sacred Damage instantly kills Enemies below %1 of their Max Health (Underlings and Specialists only)
Dealing Sacred Damage now instantly kills Champion Enemies below a percentage of their Health in addition to Underlings and Specialists
All Nearby Allies are Resurrected when your Health drops below %2 of maximum
All Nearby Allies gain %1 boost to All Resistances Score when Allies are resurrected
%1 to All Resistances Score upon Ally resurrection
%1 Spell Damage when Force Shield is above %2 and %1 Attack Damage when Force Shield is below %2
%1 Increase to Spell Damage when above Force Shield threshold and %1 increase to Attack Damage when below Force Shield threshold
Spells that inflict fire, frost, or lightning ailments grant passive bonuses called "Accords". Up to %1 "Accord(s)" can be active concurrently. Triggered "Accords" remain locked for %2s.
"Etheliel's Accord" is active for %3s unless it is triggered again. You have %1 Ailment Chance when "Etheliel's Accord" is active.
'"Abanazaar's Accord" is active for %3s unless it is triggered again. You have %1 Damage when "Abanazaar's Accord" is active
'"Beelmalik's Accord" is active for %3s unless it is triggered again. You have %1 Critical Chance when "Beelmalik's Accord" is active.
%1 Chance to Cast a Meteor at cursor location when Fire Skill is Cast. Has a Cooldown of %4s
%1 Chance to Cast a Frost Lance at cursor location when Frost Skill is Cast. Has a Cooldown of %4s
%1 Chance to Cast Chain Lightning at cursor location when Lightning Skill is Cast. Has a Cooldown of %4s

When Willpower is below %2 of its maximum, you have a chance to cause an Explosion, dealing Damage based on your maximum Force Shield or Health. This Explosion regenerates %1 of your Willpower, and has a cooldown of %4s.
Explosion caused by Willpower being below the percentage of its maximum (stated in Elementary Destabilization) deals increased damage based on your maximum Health or Force Shield.
When you hit Enemies afflicted with Stasis, they take %1 of the Hit Damage again after a %2s delay
Damage dealt after the delay is increased by %3
You gain Supernatural Paradox Points when you Hit an enemy in Stasis with an Attack, and Earthly Paradox Points when you Hit them with a Spell. Points reset after %1s. Maximum of %2 Point(s)
%1 Attack Speed Score per Earthly Paradox Point
%1 Spell Casting Speed Score per Supernatural Paradox Point
You only take %1 Damage of an Enemy's attack when it Hits, the rest is inflicted %2s after the Hit
Your Health is set to %1 of maximum, and Force Shield to %2 of maximum
Your maximum Health and Force Shield are increased by %1 and %2 respectively from the maximums set in Dire Juncture
Enemies that die in %1m radius around you have %2 chance to drop green globes. Picking up green globes grants you an additional %3 Damage as Poison Damage for %4s
Summons that die in a %1m radius around you have %2 chance to drop green globes. Picking up green globes grants you an additional %3 Damage as Poison Damage for %4s
You lose %1 of your Health and %2 of your Force Shield, but all Summons take %3 less Damage
You lose an additional %1 of your Health and %2 of your Force Shield, but summons take %3 less Damage
Every %1s, Enemies in a %2m radius gain a Poison Stack
Enemies are Slowed by %1 for %2s when they are within the radius
Occult Damage increased by %1 for every Cursed Stack an Enemy has
Health cannot exceed %1 of maximum Force Shield
When you have over %1 of the same Ailment Stack, you cleanse them, granting buffs to yourself and nearby allies
Ailment Stacks inflicted on Enemies are also inflicted on you. When you have %1 of the same Ailment Stack, they are removed and you gain bonuses
%1 Movement Speed to yourself and allies in a %2m radius for %3s when Stasis Stacks are removed
%1 All Resistance Score to yourself and allies in a %2m radius for %3s when Cursed Stacks are removed
%1 Damage increases for yourself and allies in a %2m radius for %3s when Weakness Stacks are removed.
Removing Ailment stacks that deal Damage-Over-Time restores %1 of Max Health and %1 of Max Force Shield to yourself and allies in a %2m radius
When inflicting an Ailment on yourself, %1 Chance to increase number of Ailment stacks inflicted by %2
You gain 1 "Tenet" Point every %1s up to a maximum of %2 "Tenet Points", and 1 "Tenet Point" is consumed whenever you are Hit.
Gain 1 "Headhunter" Points (Max %3) every time an enemy that is Champion or above is killed, with Points resetting after %2s. "Headhunter" Points grant %1 Material Damage
Duration of "Headhunter" Points before resetting is increased to %2s
You have %2 "Annointed Ammunition" Point(s) that are used each time a Projectile Skill is used. A Point of "Annointed Ammunition" is refilled every %1s
%1 "Annointed Ammunition" Point(s) refilled whenever you Dodge Roll
%1 "Annointed Ammunition" Point(s) refilled whenever you deal a Critical Hit
%1 Projectile Damage for each Point of "Annointed Ammunition" you have
%1 Melee Damage for each empty "Annointed Ammunition" Point
Enemies are dealt %1 Damage per the amount of Pierce remaining on a Projectile after it Hits an Enemy
Basic Attack Projectiles bounce up to %1 times to Nearby Enemies in %2m radius
Projectiles bounce to Nearby Enemies an additional %1 time(s)
%1 Frost Damage to Projectiles that have bounced.
While in Combat, gain "Cold Blooded" Points every %1s, up to a maximum of %2
%1 Attack Speed Score for %3s on Critical Hit
Basic Attacks refill "Power Charge" Points by %1. %2 "Power Charge" Points are generated per second, capped between -%3 and +%3
%1 reduction in "Power Charge" Points Cost for all Device Skills
Device and Skills with base Lightning Damage have their Damage increased by %1 multiplied by your current number of "Power Charge" Points
%2 Damage per "Overload" Point. Basic Attacks generate 1 "Overload" Point up to a maximum of %1. Using a Skill consumes all "Overload" Points but doubles Damage of the Skill
"Overload" Points are halved instead of set to 0 when consumed.

You have %1 Points shared between "Lure of Light" and "Lure of Darkness" Points. Casting a Spell converts "Lure of Light" into "Lure of Darkness", and Attacking converts "Lure of Darkness" into "Lure of Light". When "Lure of Light" and "Lure of Darkness" Points have a weighting between 6/4, they are considered to be in Equilibrium.
While "Lure of Light" and "Lure of Darkness" are in "Equilibrium", your Attacks benefit from %1 of Spell Damage bonuses and your Spells %1 of Attack Damage bonuses
While "Lure of Light" and "Lure of Darkness" are not in "Equilibrium", your Attacks lose %1 of Spell Damage bonuses and your Spells %1 of Attack Damage bonuses
"Lure of Light" and "Lure of Darkness" Points are now considered to be in "Equilibrium" when they have a weighting between 7/3
Dodge Roll Damages Enemies and leaves a Decoy for %1s
Decoy left by Dodge Roll explodes when it is destroyed, dealing Damage in a %2m radius
Dodge Roll turns you Invisible for %1s. While Invisible, the damage of your next Skill activated is increased by %2. Using a Skill breaks Invisibility. This has a cooldown of %3s.
Duration of the Invisibility triggered by a Dodge Roll is increased by %1s
%1 Block Chance while One-Handed Weapon equipped
Damage is increased by %1 multiplied by your equipped Shield's Block Chance
You receive 1 Ailment stack when inflicting an Ailment on an Enemy
If your Hits have Freeze Chance, %1 of your Freeze Chance is added to your Critical Chance. These Hits do not inflcit Freeze anymore.

%1 Critical Chance Score when Hitting a Poisoned target
